tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE theater_memberships (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name VARCHAR,
    membership_level VARCHAR,
    membership_start_date DATE,
    membership_expiry_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE theater_memberships (
    membership_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name VARCHAR(50),
    membership_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE theater_memberships (
    membership_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name VARCHAR(255),
    membership_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    expiry_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE benefits (
    benefit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    membership_id UUID,
    benefit_name VARCHAR(100),
    benefit_description TEXT,
    benefit_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE expiry_dates (
    expiry_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    membership_id UUID,
    expiry_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE theaters (
    theater_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    theater_name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(100),
    country VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE locations (
    location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    theater_id UUID,
    location_name VARCHAR(100),
    capacity INT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
)
